channel.title: News on sysgrammer
channel.description: Recent content in News on sysgrammer

item.title: Daily Updates
item.description: Re-started reading Beej’s Guide to Network Programming Added token exception handling to bot Okay Now I’ve talked about what I’ve been doing and will do, I’m thinking that mall0cd’s library might need a re write due to an issue caused by libjansson.h. I planned on helping him continue his work but after some debugging with my bot we realised that library was fundamentally flawed due to the JSON parser as indicated by valgrind.
